TenantScrAIPrmptInjection.name: TenantScrAIPrmptInjection
TenantScrAIPrmptInjection.description: Stores generative AI prompt injection data.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique across all tenants.

MaskedResponse.description: The generated response from the LLM. If masking is enabled, this may contain placeholder text.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

PlannerLlm.description: The LLM being used by the Planner.

Prompt.description: The hydrated version of prompt text before data masking is applied. The actual prompt sent to the LLM will mask sensitive data if data masking is enabled.

PromptTimestamp.description: Timestamp when this prompt injection happened.

PromptTokens.description: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant with this triggered Transaction Security Policy event.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant where this triggered Transaction Security Policy happened.
